home.paragraph3: Naruto Game is one of the most popular "browser games" from Naruto. In our game you will be a ninja and your mission is to develop your skills and chart your own ninja path to become Kage.
home.paragraph8: You are free to customize your character and create your own combinations of skills, summons, clans and elements
home.modalAcceptTerms: I declare that I have read and agree to the Terms of Use
home.modalPasswordFieldIncorrect: Confirmation of the entered passwords is incorrect.
home.modalPasswordFieldMinimumCharacter: The password must contain at least 6 characters.

footer.paragraph3: Original characters and illustrations © Copyright 2002 by Masashi Kishimoto.

notFound.title: Access Denied
notFound.paragraph1: The page you tried to access did not load and usually happens for the following reasons:
notFound.paragraph2: You don't have permission to open it or you tried to access it illegally.
notFound.paragraph3: There was an attempt to direct it to the correct location, but something prevented it.
notFound.paragraph4: Your connection to the server is not stable.
notFound.paragraph5: Please try again, if you need help, please use the Support system.
